Join more than 70 million Pixelcut creators! Pixelcut’s background remover, AI background generator, and Magic Eraser helps you create amazing photos in seconds. Pixelcut is an AI photo editor that helps you edit images with ease.

HERE’S WHAT YOU GET:
Background Eraser - Instantly remove background from any photo to get a transparent background, and then change background to an AI background or color. Pixelcut’s background remover is the most precise background remover in the world. After you remove background, you can add a white background or AI generated background to make your photos look pro. Pixelcut’s background eraser works on every type of image (even hair!) and is super accurate. Our background eraser is perfect for product photos, YouTube thumbnails or any other reason you’d like to remove background of your photo.  
Magic Eraser - Remove objects with the swipe of a finger. Erase objects and cleanup pictures in seconds. No blurry mess like other apps, with Pixelcut you can remove objects from photos like they were never there!
AI Backgrounds - Generate AI backgrounds for your photo. If you want to do more than remove background, our AI background generator will help you change background of any photo to an amazing AI generated background. Put your product on a beautiful kitchen counter or change background of a selfie to the beach!
White Background - Quickly replace background with a white background or change background to any color. You can also choose from over 2 million backgrounds.
AI Shadows - After you change background to a white background or replace background with our AI background generator, you can easily add a beatiful AI shadow to give your product a professional look!
Templates - Choose from thousands of templates designed to help you sell more!

Pixelcut’s mission is to help your photos stand out whereever you post online. You now have all of the power of a photo studio on your iPhone! 

Download Pixelcut and grow your business today!

Have questions, problems, or feedback? Reach out to us at support@pixelcut.app.

The Pixelcut Pro membership gives you unlimited and instant background removals, hundreds of templates, hundreds of fonts, overlays and backdrops, all updated monthly. Become the STAR of your own story! 

  Kimo uses cutting-edge AI to transform you into celebrities,
  change your age, swap into movie scenes, and create viral content
  that'll blow your friends' minds!

  -Celebrity Face Swap - Look like your favorite stars
  -Video Transformations - Star in epic movie scenes
  -Age & Style Changes - See yourself at any age with any look
  - Global Celebrities - Match with stars from 15+ countries
  -Creative Effects - Endless possibilities for content creation
Ever wondered what your face says about you?
With Kimo, your selfie turns into a fun, AI-powered experience where you can discover your celebrity lookalike, guess where you might be from, estimate your age, try different hair colors and styles, and even find out which job fits your face best!

Whether you're curious, bored, or just want to surprise your friends — Kimo is your personal face explorer. Fast, fun, and endlessly shareable.

 Explore Kimo’s Fun Features:
 - Celebrity Lookalike Match & Doppelganger
See which international star looks like you! From Hollywood icons to K-pop idols, Kimo compares your face to celebrities around the world using advanced facial analysis. Find your Doppelganger with KIMO

- Where Do You Look Like You're From?
Your face might say “Italy,” “Japan,” or even “Brazil.” Let Kimo guess where in the world you look like you’re from, based on your facial features.

- Age Estimator
Think you look younger than your age? Or older than your friends think? Kimo gives a fun estimation of how old you appear — just from your selfie!
- Profession Predictor
Does your face scream CEO, artist, or software engineer? Find out what profession your look might suggest — and share the fun with friends.

- Hair Color & Style Simulator
Curious how you'd look as a blonde? Or with pink curls? Kimo lets you experiment with hair styles and colors, instantly — no salon needed.

- Age Changer
Curious how you'd look at 60? Or back at 18? Kimo shows you an older or younger version of yourself in seconds.

- Pet Type Identifier

 Share the Fun
All results are designed to be easily shared on Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, and more. See what your friends think — or start a fun guessing challenge!

 How It Works:
Upload your own selfie — or your friend’s.

Choose what you want to discover (celebrity match, age, job, etc.)

View and share your results — instantly!

Privacy First
Your selfies never leave your device. All image processing happens locally on your phone. We do not store, use, or share your photos — ever.

 For Entertainment Purposes Only
Kimo is designed for fun and curiosity. Results are not scientifically or biologically accurate, and are for entertainment use only. Laugh, share, enjoy — but don’t take it too seriously 

 Subscription & Coins
Kimo requires a subscription to use. Subscribed users receive weekly coins that can be spent on features like celebrity matching, age guessing, and more.
Need more coins? You can easily purchase additional coins in-app at any time to unlock more fun.

 Terms & Privacy
By using Kimo, you agree to our terms and privacy policy:
Terms: appylo.co/terms
Privacy: appylo.co/privacy

Start exploring your face in a whole new way.
Download Kimo today — and discover your celebrity twin, your secret country of origin, your ideal job, and much more. One selfie is all it takes.

Genie AI: Turn Photos into Live Photos, Get Cool Effects in a Snap!
Ditch those boring, still photos and let 'em come alive!

Tired of your photos looking flat and uninspired? "Genie AI" is gonna blow your mind! We're all about helping you take those regular pics and instantly turn 'em into awesome Live Photos, or use our massive library of creative templates to slap on some mind-blowing effects and super fun styles.

This ain't just some regular photo editor, nah. It's your ticket to a whole new world of visual creativity!

Wanna make a landscape move? Add some magical glow to a portrait? Or even turn your furry friend into a hilarious short video? "Genie AI" makes it a breeze. We know you've got endless ideas, so we made it super easy to use, so every time you create, it's a blast!

Here are the cool features you gotta know about:
-Photos to Live Photos in Seconds: Just upload any photo, and with one tap, it'll transform into a lively Live Photo (animated pic). Your memories won't be frozen anymore, they'll be bursting with life!
-Tons of Creative Templates: Dive into our awesome template library! Movie effects, artistic filters, funny animations, holiday themes... we've got it all. You'll definitely find something to spark your imagination!
-Unique Effects with One Tap: Pick your favorite template, and boom! Your photo instantly gets a dazzling new look. No complicated steps, seriously, anyone can be a creative genius!
-Fun Ways to Play, Endless Possibilities: Use our templates to whip up all sorts of fresh and exciting visual styles. Your photos will totally stand out on WeChat, Douyin, Xiaohongshu, and everywhere else – get ready to go viral!
-Super Easy to Use, Even for Newbies: The interface is designed to be super friendly, so even if you're totally new to editing, you'll get the hang of it in no time and have a blast creating!

So, how do you use it? It's a piece of cake!
1. Upload Photos: Grab one or a few pics from your phone's gallery.
2. Choose Template: Browse through our template library and pick the effect or style you're feeling.
3. Generate in One Tap: Just hit that button, and your dynamic content with Live Photo effects or cool special effects will be ready in a flash!
4. Share it Easy: Share your amazing creations to Tiktok, Instragram, Faceboook and so on, whatever! Get ready for those likes and follows!

Go ahead, download "Genie AI" now, make your photos pop, and tell your awesome stories with dynamic visuals!

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

AR Drawing - Sketches is perfect for anyone looking to improve their sketching or drawing skills. Downloaded by over 1.5 Million users all over the world, the app stands out for its simplicity and ease of use, providing a practical way to trace and recreate any image.

Whether you're an experienced artist aiming to sharpen your techniques or a beginner hoping to produce better drawings, this app has something for you.

AR Drawing - Sketches preserves the original outlines of your image and overlays them on your drawing surface, guiding your hand and making the tracing process much easier.

You can also access drawing lessons designed to help you grow step by step, track your progress through various milestones, and find inspiration from a curated selection of images and artwork.

Key Features:

- Image Projector with AR Anchor Tool: Overlay any image onto your drawing surface using your device’s camera and anchor it precisely with AR technology. This ensures image stability and helps guide your hand as you draw.
- Light Table: Turn your phone into a virtual light table to trace images directly from the screen—ideal for sketching on paper.
- Digital Drawing: Use intuitive sketch tools to draw directly on your device, perfect for quick concept art or practicing anywhere.
- Drawing Lessons: Learn and improve your drawing skills through lessons suitable for all skill levels.
- Progress Tracking: Set goals and unlock milestones to stay motivated and see how far you've come.
- Inspiration Hub: Explore curated content to spark your creativity and try new styles.

2. Adjust the image’s transparency and contrast to make it easier to trace.
